column1: One hopes the costs of the #COVID19 test will be charged to the Gvt. Uninsured people cannot afford the entire cost of an expensive test. This is a public health emergency, cost should not be a factor as to who gets tested and who does not. This must be addressed now. cc: @VP

Trump admin thinking it was a good idea to put mike pence the face of their #covid19 virus response on a cable news network instead of broadcast news. on an opinon show no less. AND then the host of that show asking 99.9% of questions about politics.
Word on the streets. 78 #covid19 cases in Nassau County, 33 more cases in Cali. Good morning. #Covid_19
